text: could you put the timestamp and source ip to log, please?
creator: rroeilck@no-spam.hu
trawick@apache.org
text:
It is expected that the forensic log has minimal information, and that you will
log the forensic id (%{forensic-id}n format string) in your usual access log to
correlate forensic log entries to normal access log entries, which can include
far more information.
